Reviews.Title: It's cure BUT
Reviews.Author: Sarah Gaer "Dublin"
Reviews.Content: I have bought two of them in the past 3 months. The first one would only come in black and white. I bought a new one, and this one won't even turn on. Do yourself a favor, don't buy it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Precious but poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: This t.v. is precious but that's all. It was a huge disappointment. After about 10 to 15 minutes of watching the audio would start to make a static noise and it wouldn't stop.

Reviews.Title: Disney electronics are horrible.
Reviews.Author: Peter Bretherton
Reviews.Content: Do yourself a favor and search for the Disney Princess TV/DVD combo reviews. Disney must be using the absolute lowest bidder to provide their electronics and then asking them to cut corners. Talk about junk!!!

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: Ashley Carney
Reviews.Content: My daughter's tv is just out of warranty and will no longer turn on. I should have learned my lesson with her last Disney tv.

Reviews.Title: good tv
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: this is a good tv, it has a great picture if you sit right in front of it. If you are more than 15 degrees at any angle the picture degrades greatly. lots of hook ups like VGA but no HDMI. It has great sound if you consider how small the speakers are. it dose display HDTV all the way up to 1080i, and works good as a low res computer monitor. but all and all good TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Techno Geek Guru "Dave"
Reviews.Content: Great TV. My daughter has used it for a while and it's been great. Nice picture. Easy to use. I'm not sure why there are bad reviews on this product.

Reviews.Title: Beware of Disney tv products
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: Go look at the reviews for the Disney Cars Lightening McQueen tv before purchasing this one!!! Beware of Disney products!!!!!!!!!
